name: PHARMACY INDIA
description: PHARMACY INDIA FOR ALL PHARMA COMPETITIVE EXAM PREPARATION  WELCOME TO PHARMACY INDIA PHARMACY INDIA is a pioneer institute in India which provides online guidance and coaching for GPAT, NIPER, DRUG INSPECTOR, and PHARMACIST EXAMINATION.   WHY THIS APP ?? Free Demo Test  Daily Pharma Alerts Daily free video lecture Free Quiz  Performance Analysis with All India Rank   Our classes set up with an aim to provide coaching to the aspiring students who are dedicated and want to achieve excellence in their career. We provide more features test series at very low Price for GPAT, NIPER, DRUG INSPECTOR, and PHARMACIST EXAMINATION.  At Pharmacy India, we understand exactly what our students need. We have had hands-on experience with GPAT, NIPER and are thus able to provide our students with a coaching methodology that is the most appropriate and productive. Our approach to the GPAT Test Series in India is pretty elaborate and comprehensive. By giving careful attention to every subject and every topic, we make sure that our students have an abundance of knowledge.   You can join us easily by adding in a batch in App and get our Online test series, Free video lectures, Study material and many more. The test series is available for GPAT, NIPER, DRUG INSPECTOR, and PHARMACIST EXAMINATION. Our Aim is to reach every Pharmacy student and encourages learning, growth and teamwork all at the same time.
